SELECT QNA_BOARD_SEQ.NEXTVAL FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO QNA_BOARD ( QNA_SEQ, QNA_TITLE, USER_ID, REG_DATE, QNA_GROUP, QNA_ORDER, QNA_INDENT, QNA_PARENT, QNA_CONTENT, ANS_STATUS ) VALUES ( #{qnaSeq}, #{qnaTitle}, #{userId}, SYSDATE, #{qnaGroup}, #{qnaOrder}, #{qnaIndent}, #{qnaParent}, #{qnaContent}, #{ansStatus} )
mapper.select: SELECT QNA_SEQ, QNA_TITLE, USER_ID, USER_NAME, REG_DATE, QNA_GROUP, QNA_ORDER, QNA_INDENT, QNA_PARENT, QNA_CONTENT, ANS_STATUS FROM(SELECT ROWNUM AS RNUM, QNA_SEQ, QNA_TITLE, USER_ID, USER_NAME, REG_DATE, QNA_GROUP, QNA_ORDER, QNA_INDENT, QNA_PARENT, QNA_CONTENT, ANS_STATUS FROM(SELECT QNA_SEQ, NVL(QNA_TITLE, '') AS QNA_TITLE, NVL(A.USER_ID, '') AS USER_ID, NVL(B.USER_NAME, '') AS USER_NAME, NVL(TO_CHAR(A.REG_DATE, 'YYYY.MM.DD HH24:MI:SS'), '') AS REG_DATE, NVL(QNA_GROUP, 0) AS QNA_GROUP, NVL(QNA_ORDER, 0) AS QNA_ORDER, NVL(QNA_INDENT, 0) AS QNA_INDENT, NVL(QNA_PARENT, 0) AS QNA_PARENT, NVL(QNA_CONTENT, '') AS QNA_CONTENT, NVL(ANS_STATUS, '') AS ANS_STATUS FROM QNA_BOARD A,USER_INFO B WHERE A.USER_ID = B.USER_ID ORDER BY A.QNA_GROUP DESC, A.QNA_ORDER ASC, QNA_SEQ ASC)) WHERE RNUM >= #{startRow} AND RNUM <= #{endRow}
SELECT COUNT(A.QNA_SEQ) AS CNT FROM QNA_BOARD A, USER_INFO B WHERE A.USER_ID = B.USER_ID

SELECT QNA_SEQ, NVL(QNA_TITLE, '') AS QNA_TITLE, NVL(A.USER_ID, '') AS USER_ID, NVL(B.USER_NAME, '') AS USER_NAME, NVL(TO_CHAR(A.REG_DATE, 'YYYY.MM.DD HH24:MI:SS'), '') AS REG_DATE, NVL(QNA_GROUP, 0) AS QNA_GROUP, NVL(QNA_ORDER, 0) AS QNA_ORDER, NVL(QNA_INDENT, 0) AS QNA_INDENT, NVL(QNA_PARENT, 0) AS QNA_PARENT, NVL(QNA_CONTENT, '') AS QNA_CONTENT, NVL(ANS_STATUS, '') AS ANS_STATUS FROM QNA_BOARD A,USER_INFO B WHERE QNA_SEQ = #{value} AND A.USER_ID = B.USER_ID

mapper.select: SELECT NOTICE_SEQ, ADMIN_ID, NOTICE_TITLE, NOTICE_CONTENT, REG_DATE, ADMIN_NAME, NOTICE_INDENT FROM(SELECT ROWNUM AS RNUM, NOTICE_SEQ, ADMIN_ID, NOTICE_TITLE, NOTICE_CONTENT, REG_DATE, ADMIN_NAME, NOTICE_INDENT FROM(SELECT A.NOTICE_SEQ, NVL(A.ADMIN_ID, '') AS ADMIN_ID, NVL(A.NOTICE_TITLE, '') AS NOTICE_TITLE, NVL(A.NOTICE_CONTENT, '') AS NOTICE_CONTENT, NVL(TO_CHAR(A.REG_DATE, 'YYYY.MM.DD HH24:MI:SS'), '') AS REG_DATE, NVL(B.ADMIN_NAME, 0) AS ADMIN_NAME, NVL(A.NOTICE_INDENT, '') AS NOTICE_INDENT FROM NOTICE_BOARD A,ADMIN_INFO B WHERE A.ADMIN_ID = B.ADMIN_ID ORDER BY NOTICE_SEQ ASC)) WHERE RNUM >= #{startRow} AND RNUM <= #{endRow}
SELECT COUNT(A.NOTICE_SEQ) AS CNT FROM NOTICE_BOARD A, ADMIN_INFO B WHERE A.ADMIN_ID = B.ADMIN_ID
